trends: There have been 38 other sightings in South Bend
There were no other sightings in South Bend on or around October 11th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my front poarch smoking when I observed two lights at an unknown altidude moving from the nw traveling se. I was looking at what I thought was 2 airplanes or something then suddenly it split off into 4 lights while still heading s.e. about 10 seconds latter it again split into what looked like 8 lights and seconds latter it split into a dozen or so lights and at this point seemed to change direction and looked like it was moving toward the south at this point I lost sight of the objects behind some trees in my neighbors yard.I would like to add that there was cloud cover and I observed all of this below the clouds.
